entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
